attributes.action: Repeal the law that criminalises the photographing of police officers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am a photographer not a terrorist!
Police officers and their actions should not be invisible.

Your photographic evidence could be vital to justice (and maybe damning to the police force.) Do not allow your civil liberties to be slowly eroded away.

Sign this petition for a free and just society.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
